frontmatter.title: How to Deploy a Create React App with Recharts, the WikiQuotes API, and Datasets
frontmatter.description: I recently built an app utilising data from the WHO (World Health Organisation), the WikiQuotes API, Recharts, lots of CSS and JS, and, of course, passion for the subject. This will show you how to do it minutely.

frontmatter.title: A Space Themed Intro to Golang
frontmatter.description: A short article about Golang aimed for newer developers or those who have not spent much time researching the language and would like a short, concise, well thought-out, and original introduction. All code written is within a repl.
